Edit

Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to add an Azure Storage account.

Parameters
resourceGroupName
String String

The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

accountName
String String

The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to which to add the Azure Storage account.

The name of the Azure Storage account to add

parameters

The parameters containing the access key and optional suffix for the Azure Storage Account.

The headers that will be added to request.

odataQuery
ODataQuery<StorageAccountInfo> ODataQuery(Of StorageAccountInfo)

OData parameters to apply to the operation.

String String

OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

count
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

Edit

Updates the Data Lake Analytics account to replace Azure Storage blob account details, such as the access key and/or suffix.

Task<AzureOperationResponse> UpdateWithHttpMessagesAsync(string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string storageAccountName, UpdateStorageAccountParameters parameters = null, Dictionary<string, List<string>> customHeaders = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function UpdateWithHttpMessagesAsync(resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, storageAccountName As String, parameters As UpdateStorageAccountParameters = Nothing, customHeaders As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of AzureOperationResponse)
Parameters
resourceGroupName
String String

The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

accountName
String String

The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to modify storage accounts in

storageAccountName
String String

The Azure Storage account to modify

parameters
UpdateStorageAccountParameters UpdateStorageAccountParameters

The parameters containing the access key and suffix to update the storage account with, if any. Passing nothing results in no change.

customHeaders
Dictionary<String, List<String>> Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String))

The headers that will be added to request.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The cancellation token.

Returns
Task<AzureOperationResponse> Task(Of AzureOperationResponse)
